### Trump gives Nvidia green light to sell advanced AI chips to China


üß† **AI ADVANCEMENT**


In a significant development, former President Donald Trump has authorized Nvidia to sell its advanced artificial intelligence (AI) chips to China, marking a shift in U.S. policy regarding high-tech exports. This decision could have broad implications for U.S.-China relations, as well as for the AI industry, as Nvidia's chips are key components in developing cutting-edge technology. While the move is expected to bolster Nvidia's position in the global market, it may also raise concerns about national security and technological competition with China

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://cset.georgetown.edu/article/trump-gives-nvidia-green-light-to-sell-advanced-ai-chips-to-china/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_2440)**

### Bun and done: The second coming of the Shai-Hulud worm


üß† **AI ADVANCEMENT**


The article titled "Bun and done: The second coming of the Shai-Hulud worm" discusses the resurgence of the Shai-Hulud worm, a fictional creature inspired by the sandworms from Frank Herbert's "Dune" series. The piece explores how the iconic imagery and themes of "Dune" have re-entered popular culture, possibly due to recent adaptations and renewed interest in the science fiction genre. Furthermore, the article examines the cultural and symbolic significance of the sandworm

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://redcanary.com/blog/threat-detection/shai-hulud-worm/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_9455)**

### New MIT program to train military leaders for the AI age


üß† **AI ADVANCEMENT**


MIT has launched a new program designed to equip military leaders with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence (AI). Recognizing the transformative impact of AI on modern warfare, the initiative aims to integrate cutting-edge AI technologies into military strategy and operations. The program will offer participants comprehensive training on AI applications, ethical considerations, and strategic implications, preparing them to make informed decisions in AI-augmented environments. By fostering collaboration between academia and the military, MIT seeks to ensure that

### Microsoft Patch Tuesday, December 2025 Edition


üìä **TECH INSIGHT**


In the "Microsoft Patch Tuesday, December 2025 Edition," Microsoft has released a series of updates aimed at addressing vulnerabilities across its widely used software suites. This month's updates include critical patches for Windows operating systems, Microsoft Office, and Edge browser, focusing on closing security gaps that could potentially be exploited by malicious actors. Notably, a zero-day vulnerability actively exploited in the wild has been remediated. The updates emphasize Microsoft's ongoing commitment to enhancing security and user protection, reinforcing the importance for users to

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/12/microsoft-patch-tuesday-december-2025-edition/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_4396)**
